sen.j: 九鬼ヶ坂（くきがさか）は京都府南丹市美山町 (京都府)上平屋にある峠。
sen.e: Kukiga-saka Slope is a pass in Miyama-cho Kamihiraya, Nantan City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.cmt: 指示書に合わせました。

sen.j: 別名、九鬼ヶ坂峠（くきがさかとうげ）とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It is also known as Kukiga-saka-toge Pass.
It is also known as Kukiga-saka-toge Pass.

tit.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 標高295mの国道162号上に位置する峠である。
sen.e: It is 295m above sea level and it is on National Highway 162.
It is the pass located on National Route 162 at an altitude of 295 meters.
It is the pass located on National Route 162 at an altitude of 295 meters.

sen.j: 国道162号はかつての周山街道としてその名を知られる街道筋であるが、九鬼ヶ坂もその街道の難所として広く知られてきた。
sen.e: For a long time National Highway 162 had been known as the main road 'Shuzan-kaido', and Kukiga-saka Slope had been also famous as a black spot on the road.
National Route 162 is one of the main roads, known as former Shuzan-kaido, and Kukiga-saka Slope has been also famous as a chokepoint on the road.
National Route 162 is one of the main roads, known as former Shuzan-kaido, and Kukiga-saka Slope has been also famous as a chokepoint on the road.

sen.j: 2009年現在、この峠の直下にトンネルを掘削して、国道162号の交通をより円滑にしようとの声が上がっている。
sen.e: At present (in 2009), users are conducting a campaign for building a tunnel right under the pass to reduce congestion on National Highway 162.
As of 2009, voices are raised to improve the traffic flow of the National Route 162 by boring through a tunnel beneath the pass.
As of 2009, voices are raised to improve the traffic flow of the National Route 162 by boring through a tunnel beneath the pass.

sen.j: 峠付近は片側1車線が確保されており、勾配もそれほど急ではない。
sen.e: The road is two lanes wade around the pass and there aren't many steep slopes.
The road is secured double lanes wide around the pass and the inclination isn't so sharp.
The road is secured double lanes wide around the pass and the inclination isn't so sharp.

sen.j: しかし標高の割には急カーブが多く、見通しが悪いので峠区間は追い越し禁止であり、また減速帯が設けられている。
sen.e: However, in spite of the low altitude, it has many sharp bends and at some sections visibility are very poor, so lane changes is prohibited at the pass and some sections have speed bumps.
However, it has many sharp blind curves in spite of the altitude, and it is non-passing zone with speed bumps around the pass.
However, it has many sharp blind curves in spite of the altitude, and it is non-passing zone with speed bumps around the pass.

sen.j: 京都府と福井県を結ぶ幹線道路上にあるため、貨物自動車など大型車両や牽引車両も比較的多く通行しており、峠付近にトンネルの早期開通を訴える看板が掲げられている。
sen.e: The pass is on a main road connecting Kyoto Prefecture and Fukui Prefecture and many large vehicles including trucks and tractors run through it, so at present, signboards, which demonstrate for building a tunnel immediately, are found around the pass.

As the pass is on a main road connecting Kyoto Prefecture and Fukui Prefecture, quite a lot of large-sized vehicles including trucks and tow trucks go through it, so signboards requesting the early opening of a tunnel are found around the pass.
